occupation, from 1 to 7, according to
Hollingshead's classification (reverse 
numbering)
parameters.rate:
self rating of marriage, from 1 (very 
unhappy) to 5 (very happy)
parameters.nbaffairs: number of affairs in past year

reference: Fair, R. (1977) “A note on the computation of the tobit estimator”, Econometrica, 45, 1723-1727.
